data.message: eminem has given me so much strength to believe in myself when i've been down, i admmire him greatly for being able to get through to people like me, i never thought i could do anything, but i turned my attention to art and created this from my imagination, i enjoyed every bit of painting this car, i never would have dremt about doing something like this, i didn't do it for attention but to try and show people how to use their imagination. i have it up for sale now, but would just love for eminem to see this pic and know how much he has helped me believe in myself, especially in the last year x
